author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32070

#### PR validation:

`FWCore/Framework` unit tests run.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to all or some subset of "active release cycles".

- [x] 13_0_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41598
- [x] 12_6_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41620
- [ ] 12_5_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41626
- [ ] 12_4_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41627
- [ ] 10_6_X https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41643
- [ ] 9_4_X
- [ ] 8_0_X
title: Make sure to report an error if process.options.numberOfThreads has wrong type
